_header: When man has made a king of a capped man
Subjects: historical poems; Marjory, countess of Dunbar; Erceldoune, Thomas of
_description: ‘La countesse de Donbar demanda a Thomas de Essedoune quant la guere descoce prendreit fyn e yl la repoundy e dit’ — eighteen alliterative lines

BLHar2253.First Lines:
When man as mad a kyng of a capped manWhen mon is leuere oþer
                    mones þyng þen is owen…
BLHar2253.Last Lines:
…Whenn shal þis be nouþer in þine tyme ne in
                    myneAh comen ant gon wiþinne twenty wynter ant on
BLHar2253.Attributed Title:
La countesse de Donbar demanda a Thomas de Essedoune quant la guere
                        descoce prendreit fyn e yl la repoundy e dit (f.
                    127rb)
